section.name: dimensions
section.comment:
Dimension standard names may come in sets of six related standard names for each dimension:
 ```
 [dim_name]_dimension -- The full dimension size
 [dim_name]_loop_extent -- Size of dim for current call
 [dim_name]_begin - Start index for dimension
 [dim_name]_end - End index for dimension
 [dim_name]_index - Single index for dimension
 [dim_name]_selection - Array of selected indices for dimension
 ```
 Note that the cap generator may substitute among standard names in this category in order to properly call suite parts and individual schemes. In the substitutions below, the name on the left is the standard_name in the dimensions field of the caller while the name(s) on the right is (are) the standard name(s) of the callee (in the form used in the subroutine call).
 ```
 [dim_name]_dimension ==> 1:[dim_name]_loop_extent
 [dim_name]_loop_extent ==> 1:[dim_name]_loop_extent
 [dim_name]_begin:[dim_name]_end ==> 1:[dim_name]_loop_extent
 [dim_name]_begin:[dim_name]_end ==> 1:[dim_name]_dimension
 ```
 Also note that horizontal_dimension should be used in xxx_[timestep_]init and xxx_[timestep_]final routines but not in xxx_run routines.
 Currently, the only dimension which supports all six dimension types is horizontal_dimension. This and other supported dimension standard names are listed below.

standard_name.name: vertical_layer_dimension_extended_up_by_1
standard_name.long_name: number of vertical layers extended up by 1

standard_name.name: vertical_layer_index
standard_name.long_name: index of a particular vertical layer

standard_name.name: vertical_interface_index
standard_name.long_name: index of a particular vertical interface

standard_name.name: number_of_openmp_threads
standard_name.long_name: Total number of thread blocks which the host model may use to call CCPP physics run groups during the CCPP run phase.

standard_name.name: ccpp_thread_number
standard_name.long_name: Number of current thread block. This variable may only be used during CCPP run phase

standard_name.name: specific_heat_of_liquid_water_at_20c
standard_name.long_name: specific heat of liquid water at 20c

standard_name.name: latent_heat_of_vaporization_of_water_at_0c
standard_name.long_name: latent heat of vaporization of water at 0c

standard_name.name: dry_air_density_at_stp
standard_name.long_name: density of dry air at STP

section.name: state_variables
section.comment: Note that appending '_on_previous_timestep' to standard_names in this section yields another valid standard_name

standard_name.name: x_wind
standard_name.long_name: Horizontal wind in a direction perpendicular to y_wind

standard_name.name: y_wind
standard_name.long_name: Horizontal wind in a direction perpendicular to x_wind

standard_name.name: eastward_wind
standard_name.long_name: Wind vector component, positive when directed eastward

standard_name.name: northward_wind
standard_name.long_name: Wind vector component, positive when directed northward

standard_name.name: dry_static_energy
standard_name.long_name: Dry static energy Content of Atmosphere Layer

standard_name.name: do_lagrangian_vertical_coordinate
standard_name.long_name: flag indicating if vertical coordinate is lagrangian

standard_name.name: reciprocal_of_dimensionless_exner_function_wrt_surface_air_pressure
standard_name.long_name: inverse exner function w.r.t. surface pressure, (ps/p)^(R/cp)

standard_name.name: geopotential_height_wrt_surface_at_interface
standard_name.long_name: geopotential height w.r.t. local surface at interface

standard_name.name: is_initialized_physics_grid
standard_name.long_name: Flag to indicate if physics grid is initialized

standard_name.name: control_for_negative_constituent_warning
standard_name.long_name: Logging setting for negative constituent mass fixer

standard_name.name: tendency_of_dry_air_enthalpy_at_constant_pressure
standard_name.long_name: Tendency of dry air enthalpy at constant pressure

standard_name.name: tendency_of_air_temperature
standard_name.long_name: Change in temperature from a parameterization

standard_name.name: tendency_of_air_temperature_due_to_model_physics
standard_name.long_name: Total change in air temperature from a physics suite

standard_name.name: tendency_of_air_potential_temperature
standard_name.long_name: Change in potential temperature from a parameterization

standard_name.name: tendency_of_x_wind
standard_name.long_name: Change in x wind from a parameterization

standard_name.name: tendency_of_y_wind
standard_name.long_name: Change in y wind from a parameterization

standard_name.name: tendency_of_eastward_wind
standard_name.long_name: Change in eastward wind from a parameterization

standard_name.name: tendency_of_eastward_wind_due_to_model_physics
standard_name.long_name: Total change in eastward wind from a physics suite

standard_name.name: tendency_of_northward_wind
standard_name.long_name: Change in northward wind from a parameterization

standard_name.name: tendency_of_northward_wind_due_to_model_physics
standard_name.long_name: Total change in northward wind from a physics suite

standard_name.name: us_standard_air_pressure_at_sea_level
standard_name.long_name: US Standard Atmospheric pressure at sea level

standard_name.name: surface_reference_pressure
standard_name.long_name: Reference pressure used in definition of potential temperature, Exner function, etc.

standard_name.name: reference_air_pressure_normalized_by_surface_air_pressure
standard_name.long_name: reference pressure normalized by surface pressure

standard_name.name: reference_pressure_in_atmosphere_layer_normalized_by_surface_reference_pressure
standard_name.long_name: Reference pressure in atmosphere layer normalized by surface reference pressure

standard_name.name: air_potential_temperature_on_previous_timestep
standard_name.long_name: air potential temperature on previous timestep

standard_name.name: composition_dependent_specific_heat_of_dry_air_at_constant_pressure
standard_name.long_name: composition dependent specific heat of dry air at constant pressure

standard_name.name: composition_dependent_ratio_of_dry_air_gas_constant_to_specific_heat_of_dry_air_at_constant_pressure
standard_name.long_name: composition dependent ratio of dry air gas constant to specific heat of dry air at constant pressure

standard_name.name: nonconvective_cloud_area_fraction_in_atmosphere_layer
standard_name.long_name: cloud area fraction in atmosphere layer excluding clouds produced by the convective schemes

standard_name.name: water_vapor_mixing_ratio_wrt_moist_air
standard_name.long_name: Ratio of the mass of water vapor to the mass of moist air

standard_name.name: water_vapor_mixing_ratio_wrt_moist_air_and_condensed_water
standard_name.long_name: Ratio of the mass of water vapor to the mass of moist air and hydrometeors

standard_name.name: water_vapor_mixing_ratio_wrt_dry_air
standard_name.long_name: Ratio of the mass of water vapor to the mass of dry air

standard_name.name: cloud_liquid_water_mixing_ratio_wrt_moist_air_and_condensed_water
standard_name.long_name: Ratio of the mass of liquid water to the mass of moist air and condensed water

standard_name.name: cloud_liquid_water_mixing_ratio_wrt_moist_air
standard_name.long_name: Ratio of the mass of liquid water to the mass of moist air

standard_name.name: cloud_liquid_water_mixing_ratio_wrt_dry_air
standard_name.long_name: Ratio of the mass of liquid water to the mass of dry air

standard_name.name: cloud_ice_mixing_ratio_wrt_dry_air
standard_name.long_name: Ratio of the mass of ice to the mass of dry air

standard_name.name: rain_mixing_ratio_wrt_moist_air_and_condensed_water
standard_name.long_name: ratio of the mass of rain to the mass of moist air and condensed water

standard_name.name: rain_mixing_ratio_wrt_moist_air
standard_name.long_name: ratio of the mass of rain to the mass of moist air

standard_name.name: rain_mixing_ratio_wrt_dry_air
standard_name.long_name: ratio of the mass of rain to the mass of dry air

standard_name.name: ccpp_error_message
standard_name.long_name: Error message for error handling in CCPP

standard_name.name: ccpp_error_code
standard_name.long_name: Error code for error handling in CCPP

standard_name.name: ccpp_constituents
standard_name.long_name: Array of constituents managed by CCPP Framework

standard_name.name: number_of_ccpp_constituents
standard_name.long_name: Number of constituents managed by CCPP Framework

section.name: system variables
section.comment: Variables related to the compute environment

standard_name.name: water_vapor_mixing_ratio_wrt_moist_air_at_2m
standard_name.long_name: mixing ratio of the mass of water vapor to the mass of moist air, at two meters above surface

standard_name.name: water_vapor_mixing_ratio_wrt_moist_air_and_condensed_water_at_2m
standard_name.long_name: mixing ratio of the mass of water vapor to the mass of moist air and hydrometeors, at two meters above surface
